name: Thrust and Burst
description:
Move with ⇽ and ⇾. Shoot with SPACE bar. Or play with a gamepad, using the D-PAD and A button.

Thrust and Burst is a single-player infinite scrolling arcade shooter about a neon battle starship that recruits companions into it's fleet and fights the red menace of enemy battle ships.

If you enjoyed the game consider buying me a coffee!
